data.title: Compass Commercial
data.text:
Ralph Hanan joined Compass in May 2019 from The Goldstein Group where he lead the TGG Urban division, focusing on retail leasing and investment sales in all five boroughs of Manhattan and urban markets in North Jersey.

Prior to joining TGG Urban, Ralph lead retail leasing at Metropolitan Skyline Realty where he handled all of the leasing in-house for new construction projects and existing buildings owned by the Adjmi, Gammal and Cayre families since 2008; representing a portfolio of close to 200 buildings located in all five boroughs of New York and New Jersey in high traffic urban retail corridors.

While with Metropolitan Skyline and TGG Urban, Ralph has completed transactions with national, regional and local tenants to curate a tenant mix for each property that would maximize value for the owners and provide a unique and satisfying experience for the communities. Ralph also has extensive experience representing tenants in identifying the best locations for their business and handling all aspects of lease negotiations.

Ralph’s focus is commercial and community facility leasing in new developments and existing buildings as well as tenant representation and investment sales in the retail submarkets in metro New York and New Jersey with which he is so intimately familiar.

Working with Ralph Hanan, clients receive only the highest level of service with acute attention to detail, up to the minute market data and a keen negotiating style that brings deals across the finish line.

Ralph Hanan

ph: 908-433-6624

ralph.hanan@compass.com

As a leading member of Compass’ Commercial Division, Brett Weinblatt excels at serving each client with exceptional first-class service, true advocacy and full-service resources that markedly result in accomplishing their real estate goals. With over $2 Billion in gross transactions, Brett offers a commanding perspective and first-hand knowledge of the current trends of the Commercial Properties within the Greater New York and surrounding boroughs’ real estate market. Upon joining Compass in January of 2019, Brett has completed in excess of 350,000 sf of transactions totaling over $75 Million. Specializing in the Leasing of Retail, Office and Industrial Asset Classes and the representation of local and national, Institutional Landlords and Tenants, his trusted counsel and thorough and competent representation is highly valued.

During his tenure as the Manager of Commercial Leasing for the Estate of Sol Goldman, Brett was responsible for the administration and leasing of a 10 Million square foot portfolio of retail, office and industrial assets. In administrating the portfolio, some of his notable transactions included the Elie Saab flagship location at 860 Madison Avenue, which set a record on Madison Avenue for price paid per square foot, Chick-fil-A’s 12,000 sf flagship located at 711 Lexington Avenue, and American Eagle’s entrance into the Bloomingdales Market on 714 Lexington Avenue. In addition, Brett has served as the Director at Robert K. Futterman and Associates and was instrumental in representing well-known brands such as Gamestop, G-Star Raw, and Smoothie King and additional national tenants in their tri state rollout and/or expansion. This also encompassed representing landlords in achieving their leasing requirements, including Atlantic Development Group, World Wide Group, Broad Street Development, and Crown Acquisitions.

At every interaction, Brett’s proficient counsel, keen insights and deep commitment are clearly exhibited. He is very thorough in providing constant communication and is always extremely attentive, accessible and responds promptly to his clients. Delivering responsive, confident results and equitable solutions are all part Brett’s distinguished style in providing exceptional representation.

Select Recent Transactions:

711 Lexington Avenue | Chick-Fil-A – 12,000 SF Leased

5002 55th Avenue | UPS – 500,000 SF Leased

860 Madison Avenue | Elie Saab – 4,000 SF Leased

716 Lexington Avenue | American Eagle – 4,700 SF Leased

2 West Fordham Road | City MD – 3,300 SF Leased

1164 Third Avenue | Blue Mercury

180 Third Avenue | West Side Market – 5,700 SF Leased

2248 31st Street | City MD – 3,800 SF Leased

465 Lexington Avenue | Cross Fit – 13,000 SF Leased

41-45 West 34th Street | Ground Lease – 100,000 SF Leased

Contact Brett to serve your real estate interests.

Brett Weinblatt

Ph: 410-961-1601

brett.weinblatt@compass.com
